## Installation

[R version 4.4](https://www.r-project.org/)  (4.4.0 - 4.4.3) and [Rstudio](https://posit.co/downloads/) need to be installed.

Open Rstudio.

In the console, type

`install.packages("StratoBayes", repos = "https://stratobayes.github.io", type = "binary")`
